title: Los Ranchos de Albuquerque Font
content:
Hi friend

Please help me id the font used for Los Ranchos de Albuquerque

Thanks in advance

Migue

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417152115im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Gr%C3%A1fico1_4883.jpg)
author: hernando

comments.content:
Hi Miguel,

that’s (based on) [Zebra](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417152115/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/zebra.html) by [Karlgeorg Hoefer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417152115/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Karlgeorg%20Hoefer).  
F
